sentences.en: Don't expect that niggard to invite you to dinner.
sentences.cn: 别指望那个吝啬鬼会请你吃饭.

sentences.en: God is too niggard to give a person all benefits , he may give you good looks instead of wisdom , money instead of health , talent instead of opportunities ….
sentences.cn: 上帝太小气不会给一个人所有的好处，他给你外表就不给你睿智，给你钱财就不给你健康，给你天资就不给你机会…

sentences.en: I know, I have been used to the so-called niggard eyes from others.
sentences.cn: 我知道，反正我已经习惯别人投来所谓的小气的眼光了。

sentences.en: Nature is prodigal in variety, but niggard in innovation.
sentences.cn: 自然界虽富于变化却吝于革新.

sentences.en: Never have we seen such a niggard like him!
sentences.cn: 象他这样的小气鬼我们何时见过?

sentences.en: The niggard contributed little to them.
sentences.cn: 这个吝啬鬼几乎就没捐钱给他们.

sentences.en: What is magnanimous is not the Dao but the man. A niggard cannot do it.
sentences.cn: 大气的不是刀,是人, 这样的能收入袋子,小气是做不来的.

sentences.en: What magnanimous is not the Dao but the man. A niggard cannot do it.
sentences.cn: 话多是虚荣的迹象,因为在用词上过分大方的人在做事上却是个小气鬼.

trans.tran_cn: 小气的人，吝啬鬼，小气鬼
